short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle Google Meet microphone with CapsLock

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the CapsLock button as your microphone switch for Google Meet. When your CapsLock light is OFF, your mic is off. If the CapsLock light is ON, your mic is ON.
